name.zh_CN: 外贸邮件营销自动化工具 - 外贸邮件精灵

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It aimed at helping users automate, personalize, and privatize their marketing efforts to improve sales performance.
short.zh_CN: 搜几亿(soujiyi.com)外贸邮件精灵是一款基于人工智能技术的高效批量邮件营销工具，旨在帮助外贸业务员自动化、个性化、私域化营销，提高销售业绩。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With Email Marketing Automate By Soujiyi.com, you can bind an unlimited number of email accounts and quickly send emails, significantly improving your sending efficiency. The EDM email marketing AI assistant and email tracking tool can assist you in creating and sending professional email content while tracking and analyzing email open and click-through rates in real-time. This helps you better understand customer needs and interests, allowing for more precise marketing activities. 

Email Marketing Automate By Soujiyi.com enables you to easily develop new customers, improve customer satisfaction and loyalty, and achieve higher sales performance and ROI. Try it now to enhance your foreign trade business efficiency.


👉What can it do?

✅🔍 Automated marketing
Support binding multiple email accounts, choosing your pre-edited development letter template and sending a batch of timed emails to potential clients on your lead list.

✅📧Send emails
Support Gmail, Outlook and other types of email, convenient for you to use your own email resources.

✅👀Email Tracking
Support tracking email reading status, including whether the emails have been read, when they have been opened, and how many times they have been opened.

✅📊Marketing Analysis
Provide marketing analysis dashboard, including information on the number of emails sent, delivery rate, open rate, click-through rate, etc.


👉Who is it suitable for?

👩💼 Sales, marketing, job seekers, recruiters, soho, business owners, etc.


👉 What are its advantages?

✅😍The whole process is free of charge
The entire process, from information collection, customer management, to customer marketing, is free to use.

✅⚙️ Easy configuration 
Just log in to your mailbox and authorize sending emails to complete the binding.

✅📊 Data security
Directly log in to the email service provider mailbox to protect your data security.


👉Thank you very much😚

Before using our email marketing tools, please be sure to read and agree to search hundreds of millions of privacy policies  
https://manager.soujiyi.com/policy.html

If you have any questions, you can leave us a message info@soujiyi.com !
https://www.soujiyi.com/en

Overseas Business, Soujiyi Leads
Look forward to cooperating with you!
long.zh_CN:
搜几亿(soujiyi.com)外贸邮件精灵支持无限绑定邮箱数量，可快速高效地发送邮件，大幅提升发送效率。EDM邮件营销AI助理和邮件跟踪工具可以协助用户制作和发送专业的邮件内容，并实时跟踪和分析邮件的开启和点击率，帮助用户更好地了解客户需求和兴趣，从而更加精准地开展营销活动。

使用搜几亿(soujiyi.com)外贸邮件精灵，您可以轻松地开发新客户，提高客户满意度和忠诚度，实现更高的销售业绩和ROI。现在就来尝试搜几亿(soujiyi.com)外贸邮件精灵，提升您的外贸业务效率。


👉它能做什么？

✅🔍自动营销
支持绑定多个电子邮箱账户，选择您预先编辑的开发信模板，向您线索列表中的潜在客户批量发送定时邮件。

✅📧发送邮箱
支持Gmail、Outlook等多种类型的发送邮箱，方便你使用自己的邮箱资源。

✅👀邮件跟踪
支持跟踪邮件阅读状态，包括邮件是否已读、打开时间以及打开次数。

✅📊营销分析
提供了营销分析仪表板，包括已发送电子邮件数量、送达率、打开率和点击率等的信息。


👉它适合哪些人？
👩‍💼销售、营销人员、求职者、招聘人员、soho、企业主等。


👉它的优势是？


✅😍全流程免费 
从信息采集、客户管理、客户营销整个流程都免费使用。

✅⚙️配置简单 
只需登录您的邮箱，授权发送邮件，即可完成绑定。

✅📊数据安全
直接登录邮件服务商邮箱，保障您的数据安全。




👉谢谢您😚
在使用我们的邮箱营销工具之前，请务必阅读并同意 搜几亿 隐私政策 https://manager.soujiyi.com/#/login?redirect=%2Fdashboard 

您有任何问题，都可以给我们留言info@soujiyi.com!
